price: Kuma suka ce: "Bãbu mai shiga Aljanna fãce waɗanda suka zama Yahũdu ko Nasãra." Waɗancan tãtsũniyõyinsu ne. Ka ce: "Ku kãwo dalilinku idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya."
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَن يَدۡخُلَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ إِلَّا مَن كَانَ هُودًا أَوۡ نَصَٰرَىٰۗ تِلۡكَ أَمَانِيُّهُمۡۗ قُلۡ هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
